Metrics.title: Our True Strengths
Metrics.subtitle: No unrealistic marketing promises. Here is what Dipler actually delivers.

VisualBuilder.title: <gradient>Contextual & Malleable</gradient> Intelligence
VisualBuilder.subtitle: No rigid decision tree. Our voice AIs adapt dynamically to context, handle interruptions naturally, and navigate complex conversations.

adaptation.title: Dynamic Adaptation
adaptation.desc: AI adapts to context in real-time: background noise, time of day, user behavior.

interruptions.title: Interruption Handling
interruptions.desc: Users can interrupt naturally. The AI reacts instantly without losing track.

noTree.title: No Rigid Tree
noTree.desc: Forget fixed decision trees. Our AI navigates fluidly through complex conversations.

context.title: Contextual Responses
context.desc: AI understands global context and adapts responses to tone, urgency, and customer history.

api.title: API / Webhooks Control
api.desc: Control your agents via REST API, Webhooks, or integrate directly with n8n and Make.

memory.title: Conversational Memory
memory.desc: AI remembers past exchanges and personalizes every interaction.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the platform.

items.q: How does the pricing model work?
items.a: We charge per minute of conversation. You only pay for what you use.

items.q: Can I bring my own LLM?
items.a: Yes! On Pro plan and above, connect your custom LLM (GPT-4, Claude 3) via API key.
Yes, Dipler is designed with GDPR in mind. Our servers are hosted in France.
We support over 150 languages with native accents.
Our edge network delivers median audio-to-audio latency of ~500ms.

Security.title:
Security and compliance,
 <color>without compromise.</color>

lines.speaker: Agent
lines.text: Hi! Thanks for calling Dipler support. How can I help you today?

lines.speaker: Caller
lines.text: I'm interested in your Enterprise plan. Can you tell me about pricing?

lines.speaker: Agent
lines.text: Absolutely! Our Enterprise plan starts at $0.12 per minute with volume discounts.

lines.speaker: Caller
lines.text: That's competitive. We were also looking at Vapi, but your latency claims are impressive.

HowItWorks.title: From idea to production in minutes
HowItWorks.subtitle: We've streamlined the process so you can focus on building great experiences.

build.title: Build
build.desc: Design your agent with our visual builder. No coding required.
build.details: Drag and drop nodes to create complex conversation flows. Use our pre-built templates for healthcare, real estate, and more.

evaluate.title: Evaluate
evaluate.desc: Test with simulated calls and auto-QA.
evaluate.details: Run thousands of simulated conversations to identify edge cases. Our AI evaluator provides instant feedback and improvement suggestions.

launch.title: Launch
launch.desc: Deploy with one click to phone, web, or app.
launch.details: Purchase phone numbers instantly or bring your own. Embed the web widget with one line of code. Scale to infinity.

InteractiveDemo.title: Experience <gradient>Conversation</gradient>
InteractiveDemo.subtitle: Dipler agents understand context, nuance, and interruptions. Try it yourself.

healthcare.label: Healthcare
healthcare.greeting: Hi, this is Sarah from MedCare Clinic. I'm calling to confirm your appointment for tomorrow at 2 PM. Can you still make it?
prompts: Actually, I can't make 2PM, do you have anything later?

realestate.label: Real Estate
realestate.greeting: Hello, Eric here from LuxLiving. I saw you were interested in the 2-bedroom unit downtown. Are you looking to move in soon?

survey.title: Outbound Survey
survey.desc: Conducts market research surveys with high completion rates.

realestate.title: Real Estate Qualifier
realestate.desc: Screens tenants and schedules property viewings 24/7.

Integrations.title: The Neural Network of your stack
Integrations.subtitle: Dipler connects seamlessly with your existing tools. Real-time sync with CRMs, databases, and communication platforms.

items.quote: Dipler's voice agents sound so natural, our customers often don't realize they're talking to an AI. It's been a game changer for our support team.
We moved from Vapi and never looked back. The visual builder makes it incredibly easy to iterate on conversation flows without engineering support.
The white-label feature is perfect for our agency. We've built a whole new revenue stream reselling voice agents to our clients.
Latency was our biggest issue with other providers. Dipler is consistently under 500ms, which makes the conversation feel real.
The API is a joy to work with. Well documented, typed properly, and the support team is actually composed of engineers.
Our booking rates increased by 40% when we switched to Dipler for outbound qualification calls.

ROICalculator.title: Calculate your savings
ROICalculator.subtitle: See how much you save by switching from BPOs to Dipler Agents.
ROICalculator.note: *Based on Dipler Pro pricing ($0.20/min) vs your current metrics.

CTA.title: Stop losing customers to hold music.
CTA.subtitle: Deploy your first intelligent voice agent this afternoon. We give you $50 of credits to mess around.
